name: Banana Matcha Smoothie 🥗
description: Whip up this energizing Banana Matcha smoothie for a refreshing and nutritious start to your day. With the perfect blend of fruity sweetness and a hint of earthy matcha, this smoothie will have you feeling like a morning superstar!
instructions: Add the banana, matcha, almond milk, spinach, and ice to a blender.
Serve in a glass topped with a sprinkle of matcha.
